pkgmetadata.longdescription: lumen is an AI-enhanced command-line tool that optimizes Git workflows by automatically generating conventional commit messages and explaining code changes. It works out-of-the-box using Phind's AI without requiring API keys, supports multiple providers (OpenAI/Claude/Groq/Ollama/Deepseek), and offers interactive commit exploration. Features include staged change analysis, branch comparisons, markdown-rich outputs, and seamless integration with existing workflows through config files or environment variables.

lumen 是一款 AI 增强型命令行工具，通过自动生成规范提交信息和智能解析代码 变更 优化 Git 工作流。默认使用 Phind 无需 API 密钥，支持多种 AI 服务 （OpenAI/Claude/Groq/Ollama/Deepseek），提供交互式提交记录浏览功能。 可分析暂存区变更、进行分支对比， 支持 Markdown 格式输出，通过配置文件或 环境变量灵活定制，无缝集成现有开发流程。
